name: Paper Pusher (Plasma Beam Games)
description:
Paper Pusher was a game demo Ken made years ago, inspired by the likes of Cookie Clicker, Papers, Please and Raccountant.

Press '1', '2' and '3' on the keyboard to go to each of the 3 minigames: signing contracts, stamping envelopes, and sorting papers.

The game is an abandoned demo and will never be finished, so don't ask!
